** 28 讓王第二十八

又況他物乎！¶	KR2c0021_009:15a:6:10:1,KR5c0051_009:18b:1:10:3,KR5c0126_028:1a:12:1:1,KR5c0127_091:001a:7:13:2,KR5c0135_028:005a:10:13:10,KR5c0136_017:001a:10:13:2
唯无以天下為者，¶	KR5c0126_028:1a:13:1:1
可以託天下也。	KR2c0021_009:15a:6:22:1,KR3j0010_014:13b:7:20:2,KR3k0046_100:44b:6:17:2,KR4d0178_048:11b:1:8:17,KR5c0051_009:18b:2:5:3,KR5c0073_001:008b:1:10:1,KR5c0093_002:025a:4:10:8,KR5c0103_002:018b:4:15:1,KR5c0126_028:1a:14:1:1,KR5c0127_091:001a:8:8:2,KR5c0136_017:001b:1:8:3,KR5c0138_009:13b:6:3:3,KR5c0139_030:001b:7:8:4,KR5f0018_022:013b:4:9:15,KR5h0057_007:007b:7:9:9,KR5i0036_005:05p018b:1:17:11

雖貴富

王子搜非惡為君也，¶	KR3j0009_002:4a:4:7:3,KR3j0009_026:4a:4:7:171,KR3k0004_140:4b:3:39:8,KR5c0126_028:5a:40:1:11,KR5c0138_009:15a:5:14:3
惡為君之患也。¶	KR2c0021_117:3a:5:3:1,KR3j0009_002:4a:4:15:3,KR3j0009_026:4a:4:15:171,KR3k0004_140:4b:4:5:8,KR3k0046_094:32b:8:16:3,KR3k0055_392:38a:3:13:12,KR5c0126_028:5a:41:1:11,KR5c0138_009:15a:6:1:3
若王子搜者，¶	KR3j0009_002:4a:5:2:3,KR3j0009_026:4a:5:2:171,KR3k0004_140:4b:4:11:8,KR5c0051_009:20b:5:6:3,KR5c0067_002:015a:10:8:25,KR5c0106_004:004a:3:16:2,KR5c0126_028:5a:42:1:11,KR5c0127_091:002b:5:5:2,KR5c0128_029:003a:7:17:2,KR5c0135_028:007a:3:16:12,KR5c0136_017:004a:3:17:5,KR5c0138_009:15a:6:7:3,KR5c0139_030:005a:4:4:7,KR5h0057_007:009a:4:13:10,KR5i0036_005:05p019b:5:16:11
可謂不以國傷生矣，¶	KR3k0004_140:4b:4:16:8,KR3k0055_392:38a:3:24:12,KR5c0051_009:20b:5:11:3,KR5c0067_002:015a:10:13:25,KR5c0106_004:004a:4:5:2,KR5c0126_028:5a:43:1:11,KR5c0127_091:002b:5:10:2,KR5c0127_091:003b:6:16:2,KR5c0128_029:003a:8:5:2,KR5c0135_028:007a:4:4:12,KR5c0136_017:004a:4:5:5,KR5c0138_009:15a:6:12:3,KR5c0139_030:005a:4:9:7,KR5h0057_007:009a:5:1:10,KR5i0036_005:05p019b:5:21:11
此固越人之所欲得為君也。	KR3k0004_140:4b:4:24:8,KR3k0055_392:38a:3:32:12,KR5c0126_028:5a:44:1:11,KR5c0138_009:15a:6:20:3

右手攫之則左手廢，¶	KR2c0021_111:8a:4:7:1,KR2d0023_050:13b:4:8:23,KR3j0009_021:7a:6:14:6,KR3j0009_026:7a:6:14:315,KR3j0057_005:8a:4:20:0,KR3k0045_014:5a:2:7:2,KR3k0046_093:45b:8:14:9,KR5c0051_009:21a:2:11:3,KR5c0123_018:008a:9:15:2,KR5c0126_028:7a:8:1:12,KR5c0127_091:006a:8:11:28,KR5c0128_029:003b:5:13:2,KR5c0135_028:007a:8:13:12,KR5c0136_017:004a:8:2:5,KR5c0138_009:15b:1:17:3,KR5c0139_030:005b:5:10:8,KR5h0057_007:009b:8:16:11,KR5i0036_005:05p019b:9:7:11
然而攫之者必有天下。』¶	KR2c0021_111:8a:4:15:1,KR3k0039_019:11b:1:27:2,KR3k0056_130:35a:1:41:2,KR5c0051_009:21a:3:2:3,KR5c0123_018:008a:10:7:2,KR5c0126_028:7a:9:1:12,KR5c0127_091:006a:9:2:28,KR5c0128_029:003b:6:4:2,KR5c0136_017:004a:8:10:5,KR5c0138_009:15b:2:4:3,KR5c0139_030:005b:6:1:8,KR5h0057_007:009b:9:6:11,KR5i0036_005:05p019b:9:15:11

使者還
反審之，¶

故曰：¶
「道之真
以治身，¶

夫生者，¶

使者去，¶

王曰：¶「強之！」¶	KR2c0021_089:78a:2:20:1,KR5c0126_028:12a:13:1:25

吳軍入郢，¶	KR2c0021_089:78a:6:10:1,KR4c0022_017:4a:6:26:2,KR5c0126_028:12a:28:1:28,KR5i0036_005:05p021b:3:3:11
說畏難
而避寇，¶
非故隨大王也。¶	KR2c0021_089:78a:6:20:1,KR3b0012_036:24b:2:6:341,KR3k0045_079:13b:6:18:3,KR4c0022_017:4a:6:36:2,KR5c0051_009:24a:2:9:3,KR5c0126_028:12a:30:1:28,KR5c0127_091:012b:9:5:66,KR5c0128_029:007a:4:8:2,KR5c0135_028:009a:8:8:14,KR5c0136_017:007a:6:7:8,KR5c0138_009:17b:2:7:3,KR5c0139_030:010a:2:11:12,KR5h0057_007:012a:10:10:13,KR5i0036_005:05p021b:3:13:11
今大王
欲廢法毀約而見說，¶	KR5c0126_028:12a:31:4:28
此非臣之所以聞於天下也。」¶	KR5c0051_009:24a:3:9:3,KR5c0126_028:12a:32:1:28,KR5c0127_091:012b:10:5:66,KR5c0128_029:007a:5:8:2,KR5c0135_028:009a:9:8:14,KR5c0139_030:010a:3:11:12

蓬戶不完，¶	KR3k0008_022:8b:6:25:6,KR5c0126_028:14a:4:1:31,KR6s0013_051:0644b:8:24:49,KR6s0013_084:0854b:11:25:245
桑以為樞；而甕牗二室，¶	KR5c0126_028:14a:5:1:31
褐以為塞；¶	KR1d0079_002:9a:3:14:1,KR2g0018_001:15b:8:15:29,KR3a0059_033:3b:6:3:2,KR3j0172_019:12b:8:15:22,KR3j0185_057:107b:4:15:87,KR3k0049_039:86b:3:9:9,KR3k0055_292:5b:7:7:4,KR3k0056_150:20b:7:18:7,KR3k0056_155:7b:5:11:2,KR3k0057_025:21a:8:2:308,KR3k0058_097:15b:6:32:3,KR4d0394_001:58b:9:22:37,KR5c0126_028:14a:6:1:31,KR5c0138_009:18a:1:19:3,KR6q0219_003:0050a:15:1:261
上漏下濕，¶匡坐而弦歌。¶	KR3a0006_004:27a:2:21:7,KR3a0008_007:8b:2:4:3,KR3k0003_035:24b:2:7:5,KR3k0012_174:5b:10:1:6,KR3k0012_485:6a:5:2:7,KR3k0012_999:5b:10:1:8412,KR3k0012_999:6a:5:2:11869,KR3k0046_093:37b:6:4:6,KR5c0126_028:14a:7:1:31

# dating: 8110
魏牟，¶
萬乘之公子也，¶	KR2e0005_006:91a:5:19:10,KR5c0051_009:27a:7:6:3,KR5c0126_028:16a:38:1:45,KR5h0057_007:014b:8:17:16,KR5i0036_005:05p023a:5:31:11
其隱巖穴也，難為於布衣之士；¶	KR2c0021_140:20b:2:7:1,KR5c0126_028:16a:39:1:45
雖未至乎道，¶	KR2c0021_140:20b:2:19:1,KR5c0051_009:27a:8:11:3,KR5c0126_028:16a:40:1:45,KR5c0127_091:017b:5:17:94,KR5c0127_092:002a:5:7:2,KR5c0128_029:010a:10:2:2,KR5c0135_028:011a:4:2:16,KR5c0136_017:009b:6:11:11,KR5c0138_009:19b:3:8:3,KR5c0139_030:014a:9:4:16,KR5h0057_007:014b:10:1:16,KR5h0057_007:016b:1:6:18,KR5i0036_005:05p023a:6:12:11
可謂有其意矣。	KR2c0021_140:20b:3:3:1,KR3k0056_039:73a:8:13:19,KR5c0093_010:031b:10:14:13,KR5c0126_028:16a:41:1:45,KR5c0127_091:017b:6:5:94,KR5c0128_029:010a:10:7:2,KR5c0135_028:011a:4:7:16,KR5c0136_017:009b:6:16:11,KR5c0138_009:19b:3:13:3,KR5c0139_030:014a:9:9:16,KR5h0057_007:014b:10:6:16,KR5i0036_005:05p023a:6:17:11,KR6q0219_003:0050a:20:7:269

<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_028-18a>¶

孔子列然反琴	KR5c0126_028:18a:41:1:51
而弦歌，¶

曰：¶
「強力忍垢，¶	KR4d0074_046:5a:1:23:18,KR5c0126_028:22a:19:1:61,KR6d0098_001:0699a:11:15:110,KR6q0383_001:0408a:10:19:31

不踐其土。』¶	KR1g0003_028:28b:7:23:18,KR2c0021_014:24b:2:1:1,KR2d0024_024:6b:1:1:8,KR2k0015_007:1b:6:11:1,KR2o0002_013:11b:5:26:2,KR3h0009_005:15a:4:15:2,KR3j0009_019:2b:4:4:3,KR3j0009_026:2b:4:4:295,KR3j0070_001:21b:1:17:30,KR3k0012_424:7a:2:11:9,KR3k0012_509:3a:2:20:5,KR3k0012_999:3a:2:20:12086,KR3k0012_999:7a:2:11:11413,KR3k0046_086:5a:3:11:2,KR3l0002_002:34b:5:8:42,KR4b0019_003:32b:2:29:19,KR4c0013_004:14a:2:24:36,KR4c0013_004:43a:2:24:113,KR4c0014_004:17a:8:21:45,KR4c0031_001:4a:2:19:10,KR4d0074_026:4a:5:17:13,KR4h0002_018:11a:8:24:6,KR4h0003_018:1a:2:34:1,KR4h0140_815:4b:3:15:8,KR5c0126_028:24a:19:1:66,KR5c0127_092:005a:7:10:17,KR5c0127_092:007a:4:4:28,KR5c0135_028:013a:5:5:18,KR5c0136_017:012b:1:5:14,KR5c0138_009:21b:4:5:3,KR5c0138_009:31a:3:37:4,KR5c0139_030:018b:1:17:21,KR5h0057_007:017b:1:13:19,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:4:8:11

吾不忍久見也。」¶	KR2c0021_014:24b:2:9:1,KR2d0024_024:6b:1:9:8,KR2o0002_013:11b:5:34:2,KR3j0009_019:2b:4:13:3,KR3j0009_026:2b:4:13:295,KR3k0046_086:5a:3:20:2,KR4c0013_004:14a:2:32:36,KR4c0013_004:43a:2:32:113,KR4c0014_004:17a:8:29:45,KR5c0126_028:24a:21:1:66,KR5c0138_009:21b:4:13:3,KR5h0057_007:017b:2:4:19,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:4:16:11
乃負石
而自沈於廬水。	KR2c0021_014:24b:2:18:1,KR2o0002_013:11b:6:3:2,KR4d0079_057:9b:12:7:35,KR5c0051_009:30b:1:15:3,KR5c0126_028:24a:22:4:66,KR5c0136_017:012b:2:5:14,KR5c0139_030:018b:2:17:21,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:5:1:11,KR6q0219_003:0050a:27:8:278

# dating: 8110
<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_028-25a>¶

二人相視而笑曰：¶	KR1a0102_009:4b:4:17:0,KR1h0030_019:10b:6:10:7,KR1h0035_004:26b:5:3:170,KR1h0038_028:26a:4:3:154,KR1h0043_034:45a:8:11:153,KR2c0021_095:197a:1:6:4,KR3k0008_035:8a:2:32:16,KR3k0055_259:9b:1:8:10,KR4e0133_026:18a:5:13:12,KR4h0002_047:26b:4:2:24,KR4h0003_047:30a:8:29:14,KR4h0152_110:18b:2:7:5,KR4h0152_441:9b:4:13:5,KR5c0051_003:20b:7:6:3,KR5c0051_009:31a:3:3:3,KR5c0104_004:014a:7:15:1,KR5c0126_006:11a:26:1:45,KR5c0126_028:26a:1:1:69,KR5c0127_017:001b:1:11:2,KR5c0127_092:007b:5:16:35,KR5c0128_009:004b:4:11:2,KR5c0128_029:014a:5:16:2,KR5c0135_007:016a:8:1:17,KR5c0135_028:013a:10:16:18,KR5c0136_006:010a:4:1:11,KR5c0136_017:012b:6:10:14,KR5c0138_003:13a:6:9:1,KR5c0138_009:22a:3:12:3,KR5c0139_008:018b:9:1:20,KR5c0139_030:019b:5:1:22,KR5h0057_002:059b:7:14:3,KR5h0057_007:018a:7:17:19,KR5i0036_002:02p065a:3:13:24,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:9:11:11,KR6s0075_004:0441b:4:20:33
「嘻，¶
異哉！¶
此非吾所謂道也。¶	KR2c0021_020:61a:4:18:1,KR3j0009_012:7a:5:9:4,KR3j0009_026:7a:5:9:238,KR3k0013_805:2a:7:12:3,KR5c0051_009:31a:4:4:3,KR5c0126_028:26a:4:1:69,KR5c0127_092:007b:6:9:35,KR5c0128_029:014a:6:9:2,KR5c0135_028:013b:1:9:19,KR5c0136_017:012b:7:3:14,KR5c0138_009:22a:4:1:3,KR5c0139_030:019b:5:11:22,KR5h0057_007:018a:8:10:19,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:9:21:11
昔者神農之有天下也，¶	KR5c0051_009:31a:4:11:3,KR5c0126_028:26a:5:1:69,KR5c0127_092:007b:6:16:35,KR5c0128_029:014a:6:16:2,KR5c0135_028:013b:1:16:19,KR5c0136_017:012b:7:10:14,KR5c0138_009:22a:4:8:3,KR5c0139_030:019b:6:1:22,KR5h0057_007:018a:8:17:19,KR5i0036_005:05p024b:10:3:11

遇亂世
不為苟存。¶	KR2a0004_061:6b:6:4:1,KR5c0126_028:26a:22:4:72

周德衰，¶
